name: Regicide (Faust The Dead God)
description:
Regicide acts as a supplement to any GM-led roleplaying game, though it lends itself best to a co-operative storytelling style.  Made for #NerfJam2019.

You are group of gods, creating a world and following a group of heroes to entertain yourselves. However not all is equal among the divine. One of you is the monarch, and the rest are subject to their whims, creating only in relation to certain champions or where their monarch lets them. But every tyrant can be killed, and you've collected a bunch of super soakers, knock-off Nerfs and plastic swords for exactly that purpose.
